bioghist.p: George Pierce was a Justice of the Peace in Montgomery County, Pennsylvania, in the early nineteenth century.

scopecontent.p: This collection primarily consists of legal papers drawn up or witnessed by Pierce. Documents include the appointment of Samuel Maulsby as referee of lawsuit in 1813; and the appointment of Samuel Maulsby and Joseph Corson as referees in 1814. Other witness listed on documents in the collection include Isaac Pierce, Mary Pierce, and Rebecca Pierce. The collection also includes a small number of receipts.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
